law.history: Repealed 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 285, sec. 36, effective August 1, 1988. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 113, sec. 4, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 70, sec. 3, effective July 1, 1958. -- Amended 1956 (2d Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 9, sec. 3. -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 191, sec. 3.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Licenses required -- Application -- Bond, issuance of license -- Revocation -- Nonassignability -- Records.
